name: Curri
headline: Construction & industrial logistics platform.
description: Curri provides on-demand, last-mile logistics for construction and adjacent industries with our nationwide fleet of cars, trucks, and flatbeds.

founders.name: Brian Gonzalez, Founder
founders.description: Brian is co-founder and CTO at Curri primarily focused on product, engineering, and design. Previously, Brian worked in engineering leadership at companies like Dollar Shave Club and Geni. Outside of Curri, Brian loves to surf, play basketball, golf, and spend time with family.

Unlock new growth and say yes with more reliable delivery using Curri’s nationwide industrial-grade fleet and our innovative TMS platform.

Magic in Every Mile
## AI-powered delivery copilot
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66ac070fbacc5dbabfd98e15_Group%20129.png)
### Sales leaders
Grow revenue by enabling the opportunities right in front of you. Gone are the days of losing business to competition.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66ac070eee8d7d5d1433e195_Group%20127.png)
### Logistics leaders
Our technology platform will improve your on-time stats, reduce cost, and make you look like a genius.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66ac070eb622d66b570f1e65_Group%20128.png)
### Location managers
The brick & mortar is where exceptions arise. With Curri at your fingertips, your operations will run as smooth as butter.
[Request a demo](http://www.curri.com/</demo>)
### An intelligent final mile solution, for every enterprise
Our expertise, technology, and knowledge within middle & final-mile logistics will help you take your business to the next level. [Request a demo **- >**](http://www.curri.com/</demo>) to see how.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66bb277fe27d65262cd1ea89_Nationwide%20Network%20Illustration.webp)
#### Nationwidecarrier network
With access to our nationwide carrier network, handle spikes in demand or degradation in your fleet like a pro. Elastic fleet = superpower.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/637b99f3986bcd8a6a16ebdf_Fully%20Featured%20Illustration.webp)
#### Fully-featured logistics software
From dedicated drivers, to on-demand fleet, rate-shopping and route planning software, we have solutions for every logistics pain.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/637b99fd26469244afea2513_Exception%20Tracing%20Illustration.webp)
#### Exceptions management & Live support
Our platform eliminates issues before they become logistical nightmares. Reach out to our success team when you need a human touch.
WHAT YOU GET WITH CURRI
#### A batteries-included platform
Everything you ever wanted out of a logistics partner, all bundled into the Curri delivery logistics platform
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed0f550314dee228f39_Layer%2010.png)
##### Single vendor
Turn 1000 invoices into one. Onboard preferred carriers or use our 2M+ network of certified & ranked providers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed0334ca901a5c63c27_Layer%2011.png)
##### Intelligent matching
Our platform drives down your expenditures by shopping loads across a robust network of providers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed0a7f83c810caa1d07_Layer%2012.png)
##### Multi-service
We offer rush, same-day, scheduled, or dedicated services — no matter how you need it there, we’ve got it covered
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed062f80092a02fb2bf_Layer%2013.png)
##### Customer experience
Transparency baked directly into the platform through notifications, live tracking, and more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed0ccefe10ff998cc60_Layer%2014.png)
##### Collaborative logistics
Team-first logistics allow you to manage your supply chain, transparently, together‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed08539828c1026f61f_Layer%2015.png)
##### Any vehicle, every time
From sedans to semi-trucks, hotshots to freight, our nationwide fleet has it all‍
[Talk with our team](http://www.curri.com/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66bb27da7b050474b0c413f7_Curri-Video-Background.webp)
See how Curri works
[![play button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/63bde080b4cbe62d99ebfbaf_Play%20Button%20\(1\).svg)](http://www.curri.com/<#>)
WATCH IN 53 seconds
#### Explore your potential growth

CURRI HELPS YOU GROW

## Powering logistics  across your business
Delight your customers, scale operations, and boost efficiency with our advanced logistics platform. We’re here to supercharge your supply chain. 
Delivery LOGISTICS that unlock your potential
## A fully-integrated suite of supply chain products
Our end-to-end platform enables you to run a supply chain that drives up your bottom line, grows sales, and cuts the waste.
[Let's chat](http://www.curri.com/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/637ba548b1a65fa05b0fb851_Booking%20Faux%20UI.webp)![truck from above](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/637d3b9e94ff565586d9a086_Overhead%20view%20Truck%20Illustration.webp)

![truck from above](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/6373917d172d0f41f98352ef_Overhead%20view%20Truck%20Illustration.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/6374f682fc01b96d7e757339_Hand%20drawn%20Arrow%202.webp)
WE INTEGRATE EASILY
## Connect tools with Curri
One or two-way connections from your TMS, ERP, Financial Processes, eCommerce, Single Sign-On, and more. Don't see it? We'll build it.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/669a94fa5e6b52fb3b28074d_Integrations%20\(2\).png)
Upgrade Your Building Materials Delivery Service
### A tech-first platform with a nationwide presence
With access to our nationwide network, you’ll never have to deal with supply chain headaches or shipping bottlenecks again.Turn your _supply pain_ into a thriving supply chain.
### Let's grow your business, together.
[Get a demo](http://www.curri.com/</demo>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66ac06753e46eedd7f6d78fa_Untitled_Artwork%2014%201.png)

## AI-powered delivery copilot
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66ac070fbacc5dbabfd98e15_Group%20129.png)
### Sales leaders
Grow revenue by enabling the opportunities right in front of you. Gone are the days of losing business to competition.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66ac070eee8d7d5d1433e195_Group%20127.png)
### Logistics leaders
Our technology platform will improve your on-time stats, reduce cost, and make you look like a genius.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66ac070eb622d66b570f1e65_Group%20128.png)
### Location managers
The brick & mortar is where exceptions arise. With Curri at your fingertips, your operations will run as smooth as butter.
Request a demo⟨8⟩
### An intelligent final mile solution, for every enterprise
Our expertise, technology, and knowledge within middle & final-mile logistics will help you take your business to the next level. Request a demo **- >**⟨8⟩ to see how.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66bb277fe27d65262cd1ea89_Nationwide%20Network%20Illustration.webp)
#### Nationwidecarrier network
With access to our nationwide carrier network, handle spikes in demand or degradation in your fleet like a pro. Elastic fleet = superpower.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/637b99f3986bcd8a6a16ebdf_Fully%20Featured%20Illustration.webp)
#### Fully-featured logistics software
From dedicated drivers, to on-demand fleet, rate-shopping and route planning software, we have solutions for every logistics pain.‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/637b99fd26469244afea2513_Exception%20Tracing%20Illustration.webp)
#### Exceptions management & Live support
Our platform eliminates issues before they become logistical nightmares. Reach out to our success team when you need a human touch.
WHAT YOU GET WITH CURRI
#### A batteries-included platform
Everything you ever wanted out of a logistics partner, all bundled into the Curri delivery logistics platform
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed0f550314dee228f39_Layer%2010.png)
##### Single vendor
Turn 1000 invoices into one. Onboard preferred carriers or use our 2M+ network of certified & ranked providers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed0334ca901a5c63c27_Layer%2011.png)
##### Intelligent matching
Our platform drives down your expenditures by shopping loads across a robust network of providers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed0a7f83c810caa1d07_Layer%2012.png)
##### Multi-service
We offer rush, same-day, scheduled, or dedicated services — no matter how you need it there, we’ve got it covered
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed062f80092a02fb2bf_Layer%2013.png)
##### Customer experience
Transparency baked directly into the platform through notifications, live tracking, and more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed0ccefe10ff998cc60_Layer%2014.png)
##### Collaborative logistics
Team-first logistics allow you to manage your supply chain, transparently, together‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63734c3e67347c96ff82a923/66da2ed08539828c1026f61f_Layer%2015.png)
##### Any vehicle, every time
From sedans to semi-trucks, hotshots to freight, our nationwide fleet has it all‍
Talk with our team⟨8⟩

generated_description:
Curri is a construction and industrial logistics platform founded in 2018 and based in Ventura, California. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S19, they’ve quickly carved out a niche in providing on-demand, last-mile logistics specifically for the construction sector and adjacent industries, leveraging a nationwide fleet of vehicles, including cars, trucks, and flatbeds. You can learn more about their offerings on their website: [Curri.com](http://www.curri.com).

With a growing team of 104 employees, Curri specializes in simplifying logistics through their tech-driven solutions. Their operations include services like Hotshots for same-day delivery, dedicated trucks for recurring needs, full truckload services, and an API that allows seamless integration with other systems. They also focus on providing real-time visibility and proactive exception management, making their platform well-suited for modern supply chain challenges.

Curri is not just about logistics; it's about enhancing the entire delivery experience for businesses in various industries, including HVAC, electrical, automotive, and plumbing. They even have partnerships with notable companies, improving their credibility and reach.

With over 2 million qualified carriers, they offer an extensive network designed to handle surges in demand while maintaining efficiency and transparency. Their goal is straightforward: to empower businesses by unlocking new growth opportunities through reliable delivery, reducing operational headaches, and driving down costs.

If you're looking to elevate your logistics strategy, Curri’s platform promises a comprehensive solution, acting as both a logistics provider and a technology partner. Whether you need quick deliveries or ongoing support, they seem set to help you succeed. 

In short, Curri is not just a logistics company; it's a potential game-changer in the construction and industrial sectors, offering a much-needed blend of technology and practicality in supply chain management.
